description:
A manual of  True Comprehensions of the Way, hides the secrets of dao, an art that divines tens of thousands of formulas and allows one to hold the Three Thousand Paths within one’s grasp.

A poor youth rises up, spending ten years to understanding the scripture!

Obtaining a sword from the heaven and earth, he protects the world with his own abilities!

A great calamity of three thousand years descend, but who will arise as a heavenly warrior? On this celestial road, who dares to take on this challenge?>
